sense.def:
To teach someone something
pomeni nekomu dati navodila, da bo nekaj vedel ali znal narediti.

seg.quote: Mother taught me how to read.
Boylan had taught him to drive.

sense.def:
To teach someone to think or behave in a particular way
pomeni nekoga prepričati, da razmišlja ali se vede na določen način.

seg.quote: We've been taught to believe in the wisdom of those who govern us.
Boys are often taught that they mustn't show their feelings.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
teaches
, je zaposlen v šoli, na kolidžu ali univerzi in učencem ali študentom podaja snov, ki se jo morajo naučiti.

seg.quote: I taught history for many years.
